fulltext:
Vu Viet Hoang 
 Github: https://github.com/
hoangvv511 
SUMMARY 
I am a 4th year student at UIT (University of Information Technology), my hobby is watching 
movies and coding, I have a passion for moblie programming, especially with android because I 
always want to be able to create close applications and help my friends and relatives in daily life. 
I also often find out about new languages and technologies, my ability to work in a team is 
good and I also regularly help my teammates. 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
•Programming Languages:
-
JavaScript (ES6)
- C#
- Java
•Frameworks/ Platforms:
-
React-Native / Reactjs / Nodejs
-
Restful API / JSON
•Database :
-
MS SQL
- Firebase
- MongoDB
•Others :
-
Understand OOP architecture
-
Basic Photoshop skill. Can do simple design: logo, banner…
•Version Control:
- Git
- SourceTree
•Foreign Languages: English
-
Document reading comprehension
-
Basic communication
•Soft Skills:
-
Time management
- Teamwork
EDUCATION 
  University of Information Technology (UIT)
From 09/2015 to Now 

Studying Software Engineering.

GPA : 7.43
PROJECT AT UNIVERSITY 
Ho Chi Minh City Blood Donation Center 

Project Description : A mobile application that helps people in Ho Chi Minh City keep up
with the latest blood donation news and help them register for blood donation.

Team Size : 3
 Responsibilities:
-
Design UI
-
Build API get data from server
-
Develop and bug fixing
E-Math 
 Project Description : An application that helps students prepare for college mathematics 
exams efficiently, analyzes and evaluates exam results, and issues topics that need 
improvement. 
 Team Size : 3 
 Responsibilities: 
- 
Build database with firebase and sqlite 
- 
Analyze the exam data and return result statistics 
- 
Develop and bug fixing 
Movie247 
 Project Description : The mobile app helps people watch movies for free 
 Team Size : 3 
 Responsibilities: 
- 
Design UI 
- 
Build API server using PHP 
- 
Develop and testing 
EXPERIENCES 
UHOUSE                                                                                                                        From 03/2019 to Now 
Position: Fresher 
Project: Dinogo 
 Project Description: Dinogo is an innovative, cutting-edge english learning app 
focused on improving user’s communicative english speaking and listening skill. 
 Team Size: 7 
 Responsibilities:  
- 
Design UX/UI and implement the solution (both back-end and front-end) based 
on the requirements  
- 
Develop game modules for learning skill 
- 
Develop admin page to connect with API server 
 

